Simplesitegen asset manager demo

List of pages Highlight clickable items Toggle notes

Commodity items only have a description, they can be assigned to groups and can be reserved.

In the list below, commodity items and tracked items can both be selected, in this case the details only "mixed selection" is visible.

narrow version of this tab sticks on scrolling,
can be expanded

this row sticks on scrolling

In case of a lot of toggles this breaks down to multiple rows. Each item toggleable.

Each timespan only available at selected intervals. Eg less than 1 week -> Hours is selectable

the category dropdown filters the types below, and the add new type screen adds types to this category.
